text.name: Koschei's Needle
text.description:
{Koschei's Needle}

Casts expert Destroy Undead at the beginning of battle.
text.event: Suddenly, you stumble on an old oak tree with a case in its branches. You climb the tree and break the case, then a hare comes from it. After you kill the hare, a duck comes out. When you shot the duck, you finally gain the egg, which hides the needle - the Koshey's death.
